participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Curious and introspective, Emily enjoys exploring new ideas and gaining knowledge.
participant_1.background: my favorite kind of movie is a documentary. i'm pregnant with my first child. i live with my husband in pennsylvania. i read a book every week.

participant_2.name: Jason
participant_2.personality: Ambitious and stylish, Jason has a keen sense of luxury and appreciates the finer things in life.
participant_2.background: my dream car is a rolls royce ghost. i like shopping. my family doesn't support my career choices. i currently work for a watch dealer.

content.text: My dream car is a Lamborghini urus
